Interface Shape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, ComposedShape, Polygon, PolygonDyn, PolygonVect, Rectangle, Triangle

    public interface Shape
extends java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    Since:
    17-01-2019 Shape interface implements the Comparable interface.

      • Draw

        void Draw(java.awt.Graphics o)
        Draw takes a Graphics object as parameter and draws the shape. This method will be called from the paintComponent method of a JPanel object.
